content: CP 648-E firestop endless wrap strips Intumescent, flexible firestop wrap strip to help create a fire and smoke barrier around combustible pipe penetrations ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Firestop collars, wraps and bandages- - - ### FEATURES:Features Quicker and easier installation – no hooks, anchors or drilling Installed inside the base material – ideal when space and access are limited Endless solution – one product for most penetrant sizes Applications An intumescent, flexible firestop wrap strip for combustible pipe penetrations Concrete, masonry floor and gypsum wall assemblies For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: LEED VOC: 7.6 g/l Expansion ratio (unrestricted, up to): 1:19 Can be painted: No Technical Data | Base materials | Concrete, Masonry, Gypsum | LEED VOC | 7.6 g/l | Expansion ratio (unrestricted, up to) | 1:19 | Expansion temperature (Approx.) | 410 °F | Can be painted | No | Length | 393-11/16 in | Product Class | Ultimate | Application temperature range | 23 - 122 °F | Storage and transportation temperature range | 23 - 122 °F | Temperature resistance range | -4 - 212 °F ### ITEMS- 304308 - FS wrap strip CP 648-E 1 x 33 - Package Size 1 pc - 283222 - FS wrap strip CP 648-E 1 6 pk - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 6x FS wrap strip CP 648-E 1 x 33 - 304309 - FS wrap strip CP 648-E 1-3/4 x 33 - Package Size 1 pc - 283223 - FS wrap strip CP 648-E 1-3/4 6 pk - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 6x FS wrap strip CP 648-E 1-3/4 x 33
